Convenient Design: all pipes are designed with threads; You can easily build a variety of DIY furniture frames and shelves by simply connecting threaded rods or pipes with elbows and other parts; No screws are required during the whole process; The operation is simple and fast

Size Adaptability: the DIY black pipe accessories in this set are all compatible with 1/2-inch threads, and provide two pipe's outer wire length options of 11.8 inches and 1.9 inches, which can flexibly meet different assembly needs and allow unlimited creativity

Wide Range of Uses: this set of 148 pipe fittings is widely used in many fields such as home retro furniture making, DIY creative projects, shelf hanging decoration, and so on; ; Whether it is to create tubular furniture, hangers, shelves, table legs, or industrial style decoration, our cast iron pipe fittings can handle the task with performance and functional design
